snippet: The Chester Upland district’s fiscal woes – it is bordering on insolvency – are compounded by a charter school with which it shares its financing.
abstract: Pennsylvania's Chester Upland School District is experiencing a toxic brew of budget cuts, mismanagement and area poverty; district's financial woes are compounded by the fact that it shares financing with Chester Community Charter School, which the district sees as sucking up more than its fair share of scarce resources because it receives preferential treatment from the state.
lead_paragraph: The Chester Upland district’s fiscal woes – it is bordering on insolvency – are compounded by a charter school with which it shares its financing.

headline.seo: Pennsylvania Schools’ Funding Fight Pits District Against Charter
headline.main: Pennsylvania Schools’ Financing Fight Pits District Against ‘Charter on Steroids’
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Schools’ Financing Fight Pits District Against ‘Charter on Steroids’
